segments.text: I watch as the water continues to flow, pooling beneath the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's strange to see her so detached from the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a ticking time bomb, just waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s daring reach for those cookies adds to the tension; I can hardly breathe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about all the times I’ve taken risks just to grab what I wanted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sweet in a way, the childlike enthusiasm, but I can’t ignore the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m torn between wanting to yell at them and wanting to let them enjoy their childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR
